name: Coulrophobiac 2
description:
You hate clowns? You love zombies as enemies in a shooter game? You love to kill clown-zombies? Welcome to "Coulrophobiac 2 - A labyrinth full of horror clowns"

This game is more of the same and even better...If you don´t know "Coulrophobiac", then look also at this game https://nyarlathotep198.itch.io/coulrophobiac

CLOWNS ARE EVIL!!!
